name: Banker: A Board Game Money Manager
name_original: Banker: A Board Game Money Manager
description:
(MONOPOLY® is a registered trademark of Hasbro, Inc. The author of this application has no affiliation with Hasbro and this application is not associated with or endorsed by Hasbro.)

Banker is an app that brings the classic board game MONOPOLY® into the 21st century by allowing you to play the game without cash. No more wasting time hunting in your couch cushions for that last dollar bill to cover your luxury tax. Now you can become a monopolist completely electronically! (Just like in the real world.)

• Streamline your gameplay experience by handling all cash transactions within the app.
• Easily transfer cash by dragging and dropping between players or the bank.
 • Track money for up to 9 players. 
 • Extremely intuitive and user friendly.
